name: Stick Me: Custom
description:
** Time to do it Stickman Style - The coolest app out there! **

* FREE to get it limited time only*

Be hero of a stickman and let it know your friends!

Stick Me is the only one marvellous app, that was created in Stickman style and can help you to create really funny photos from your own and your friends using the body of Stickman HERO.

Stick Me Free has an instant preview of the Stickman figures so you can see what they will look like on your phone BEFORE you actually go ahead and save the stickman figure! You can always see what your custom made stickman figures will look like!

Features:

* Beautiful and EXCLUSIVE RETINA resolution stickman figures for all iPhone, iPod touch and iPad models!!
* UNIQUE and EXCLUSIVELY tailored wallpapers for your device!
* you can e-mail it to anyone
* you can send the photos per sms
* you can relate it to your phone numbers
* you can use your own photo album and choose photos you want
* flexible head sizing
* Like/Save all the figures in the app!
* Show off and share your photo with everyone on facebook!
* Show off and share your photo with everyone on twitter!
* UNIVERSAL application, install it on all your devices!
* 5 marvellous images

COMING SOON...
- bodies of new heroes
- much more backgrounds
- and more...
